#summary Details about how Darter should be implemented.
#labels Phase-Requirements,Phase-Design,Featured

= Introduction =

This document describes the requirements of the implementation of Darter.

= Front End Structure =

The front end should consist of the following 4 pages:

  * Overview
  * Packages
  * Index
  * Detail page

== Overview ==

The overview shows all classes and interfaces and their inheritance.

== Packages ==

This page lists all classes group by their [Packages packages].

== Index ==

On this page all classes and interfaces are listed in an alphabetic index.

== Detail page ==

The details page shows more information about a specific class or interface.
